name: GLYPH: TIME MANIPULATION
description:
Glyphs are spells that can be used to manipulate and distort our reality or even summon beings from other dimensions, and like the sigils they can be conjured and created (if you're a powerful enough wizard) for any means necessary.
This glyph was created by a now nameless wizard, who went crazy trying to know all that could be, it allows it's user to relieve the same moment three times, thus being able to perceive more than one unfolding of reality.

800x800gif mousedrawn on a Deluxe Paint emulator for the MS-DOS
